title: The Texas Revolution

scenes.narration: In the heart of Texas, a new chapter begins. From the bustling streets of Austin to the oil fields of Dallas, the cannabis revolution takes root.

dialogue.speaker: Farmer
dialogue.text: The revolution starts with a single seed, planted with hope and nurtured with determination.

dialogue.speaker: Advocate
dialogue.text: We are the future of cannabis in Texas. No longer will we hide in the shadows.

dialogue.speaker: Entrepreneur
dialogue.text: The market is ready, the people are ready, and Texas is ready for change.

visuals: Cannabis fields stretching to the horizon
endCard: Join the Texas Revolution. The future is now.
